alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:26PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LAFAYETTE...CENTRAL ACADIA... NORTHERN VERMILION...NORTHWESTERN ST. MARTIN AND SOUTHERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 1000 PM CST... At 925 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Swords to near Morse to 6 miles southwest of Lowry. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Opelousas, Crowley, Abbeville, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, Kaplan, Church Point, Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Broussard, Youngsville, Sunset, Port Barre, and Duson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 75 and 116. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
